entry.title: Monday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. Rain showers or flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
